item.description:
We will be visiting Sue McCormick's home in South Portland (postponed from July) to take a look at what she has happening, talk about her "wish list" and brainstorm some permaculture solutions!

We'll tour the property first then have a group potluck supper, as always.

This meetup is open to all experience levels from novice to expert. Focus is on community-building and learning from each other.

** Have any extras from your garden? Bring them for a swap! **

Note, if your plans change pls update your RSVP on this web site (as your 'yes' or 'maybe' locks up a spot for someone else).

Potluck breakdown:
Last name starting with A-G bring whatever you want
Last name starting with H-M bring bread or beverage
Last name starting with N-S main or side dish to share
Last name starting with T-Z bring salad or veg or dessert

Enjoy the harvest and see you in August!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Portland Maine Permaculture August Meetup
